member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.Fields
member.summary: The table field(s) to retrieve.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.GroupBy
member.summary: Field(s) on which to group results, corresponding to an SQL GROUP BY clause.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.Having
member.summary: Conditions for grouped values, corresponding to an SQL HAVING clause.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.JoinOn
member.summary: Conditions for joining multiple tables (LEFT OUTER JOIN), corresponding to an SQL JOIN ON clause.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.Limit
member.summary: A limit on the number of results returned.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.Offset
member.summary: The query offset.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.OrderBy
member.summary: The order of results, corresponding to an SQL ORDER BY clause.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.Tables
member.summary: The Cargo database table or tables on which to search.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters.Where
member.summary: The conditions for the query, corresponding to an SQL WHERE clause.

member.name: T:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoWikiSiteExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for MediaWiki sites with Cargo extension installed.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoWikiSiteExtensions.ExecuteCargoQueryAsync(WikiClientLibrary.Sites.WikiSite,WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.CargoQueryParameters)
member.summary: Executes a Cargo query and retrieves the response rows.
member.param: a MediaWiki site with Cargo extension installed.
a token used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: a list of rows, each item is a JSON object with field name as key.
member.exception: . is 0 or negative. - or - . is negative.
When query execution failed, Cargo usually fails with internal_api_error_MWException error. You should observe "MWException" as the value of .

member.name: T:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Linq.CargoFunctions
member.summary: Contains stub methods used inside expressions in extension methods. These methods are used for building LINQ query expressions and are not intended to be invoked directly.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Linq.CargoFunctions.DateDiff(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Returns the difference ( - ) between 2 dates expressed as a value in days from one date to the other.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Linq.CargoFunctions.DateDiff(System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset})
member.summary: Returns the difference ( - ) between 2 dates expressed as a value in days from one date to the other.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Linq.CargoFunctions.Holds``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},``0)
member.summary: Determines whether the list-typed field contains a certain value. (See mw:Extension:Cargo/Querying data#The "HOLDS" command.)
member.param: Cargo table field expression of type list.
member.returns: whether the list contains the matching element.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Linq.CargoFunctions.HoldsLike``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the list-typed field contains any value matching the specific LIKE wildcard expression. (See mw:Extension:Cargo/Querying data#HOLDS LIKE.)
member.param: Cargo table field expression of type list.
the matching pattern with % or _ wildcard.
member.returns: whether the list contains the matching element.

member.name: T:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames
member.summary: Special column names as listed on mw:Extension:Cargo/Storing data#Database storage details

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.FieldName
member.summary: (__files table) The name of the relevant field of type "File".

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.FileName
member.summary: (__files table) The value of the field, i.e. the name of an uploaded file.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.Id
member.summary: Holds a unique ID for this row.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.Left
member.summary: (__[ColumnName]_hierarchy table) The number of the leftmost node represented by this value.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.PageId
member.summary: Holds the internal MediaWiki ID for that page.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.PageName
member.summary: Holds the name of the page from which this row of values was stored.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.PageNamespace
member.summary: Holds the numerical ID of the namespace of the page from which this row of values was stored.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.PageTitle
member.summary: Similar to , but leaves out the namespace, if there is one.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.Position
member.summary: (__[ListColumnName] table) Holds the position of this value in the list (can be 1, 2, etc.)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.Right
member.summary: (__[ColumnName]_hierarchy table) The number of the rightmost node represented by this value.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.RowId
member.summary: (__[ListColumnName] table) Holds the ID of the row (i.e., _ID) in the main table that this value corresponds to.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoSpecialColumnNames.Value
member.summary: (__[ListColumnName] table) Holds the actual, individual value. (__[ColumnName]_hierarchy table) The allowed value.

member.name: T:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableDefinition
member.summary: Represents the schema of a Cargo table.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableDefinition.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldDefinition
member.summary: Represents a field in .

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldDefinition.IsList
member.summary: Whether this field is of List type.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldDefinition.IsMandatory
member.summary: If set, the field is declared as mandatory, i.e. blank values are not allowed.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldDefinition.ListDelimiter
member.summary: For fields of List type, this is the delimiter of the list item.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldDefinition.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Page
member.summary: Holds the name of a page in the wiki (default max size: 300 characters)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.String
member.summary: Holds standard, non-wikitext text (default max size: 300 characters)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Text
member.summary: Holds standard, non-wikitext text; intended for longer values (Not indexed)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Integer
member.summary: Holds an integer

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Float
member.summary: Holds a real, i.e. non-integer, number

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Date
member.summary: Holds a date without time

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.EndDate
member.summary: Similar to Date, but are meant to Hold the beginning and end of some duration. A table can hold either no Start date and no End date field, or exactly one of both.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Datetime
member.summary: Holds a date and time

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.EndDatetime
member.summary: Work like Start date or End date, but include a time.

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Boolean
member.summary: Holds a Boolean value, whose value should be 1 or 0, or 'yes' or 'no' (see this section for Cargo-specific information on querying Boolean values)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Coordinates
member.summary: Holds geographical coordinates

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.WikitextString
member.summary: Holds a short text that is meant to be parsed by the MediaWiki parser (default max size: 300 characters)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Wikitext
member.summary: Holds longer text that is meant to be parsed by the MediaWiki parser (Not indexed)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Searchtext
member.summary: Holds text that can be searched on, using the MATCHES command (requires MySQL 5.6+ or MariaDB 5.6+)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.File
member.summary: Holds the name of an uploaded file or image in the wiki (similar to Page, but does not require specifying the "File:" namespace) (default max size: 300 characters)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.URL
member.summary: Holds a URL (default max size: 300 characters)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Email
member.summary: Holds an email address (default max size: 300 characters)

member.name: F:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.CargoTableFieldType.Rating
member.summary: Holds a "rating" value, i.e. usually an integer from 1 to 5

member.name: T:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.DataAnnotations.CargoListAttribute
member.summary: Annotates the property as a cargo list, i.e. List () of [type].

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Cargo.Schema.DataAnnotations.CargoListAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize the attribute with comma (,) as list separator.
